head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'BRIEN, LOUISE (NEE ANGELUCCI)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'BRIEN, LOUISE (NEE ANGELUCCI)

block.p: O'BRIEN--Louise (nee Angelucci) of Bergenfield, NJ (formerly of Tenafly, NJ) on January 2, 2005. Beloved wife of Dr. Joseph. Devoted mother of Anne, Joseph Jr. and Bevin Trennert. Loving grandmother of Dominic Trennert. Dear sister of Sandy Angelucci and Rita Langston. Friends may call at the Barrett Funeral Home, 148 Dean Dr, Tenafly, NJ on Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass Thursday 10 AM, Mt. Carmel Church, Tenafly. Interment Brookside Cemetery, Englewood, NJ. Family would appreciate donations to Ovarian Cancer Research Fund, 14 Pennsylvania Plaza, Suite 1400, NY NY 10022. For directions, www.barrettfuneralhome.net
